contributions.title: ATM Jackpotting (The Register)
contributions.description: At the Black Hat security conference in Las Vegas, Barnaby Jack, a security researcher with IOActive, demonstrated attacks against two unpatched models from two of the world's biggest ATM makers.

contributions.title: Broken Hearts (IOActive)
contributions.description: In 2012 Jack demonstrated the ability to assassinate a victim by hacking their pacemaker.

gallery.title: Barnaby Jack at the 2010 Black Hat convention
gallery.caption: The showman and the cash-spewing ATMs: Barnaby Jack at the 2010 Black Hat convention.

gallery.title: Barnaby Jack shows one of his two ATM machines
gallery.caption: Barnaby Jack shows one of his two ATM machines he bought on line and has hacked into, at his San Jose home on Tuesday, Aug. 31, 2010.
